original_title: Aus dem Zeitalter des Ãœbermuts (Dichtung und Wahrheit)
overview: The fourth of five parts of Klaus Wyborny's "Lieder der Erde" / "Song of the Earth" cycle of films, whose theme is "the emergence of modern European civilization." The series comprises five large parts, which are in turn divided into various selections or short films.
title: From the Age of Recklessness (Song of the Earth Part 4)
